Class FeatureObject

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.persistence.FeatureObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loadable, Marked
Direct Known Subclasses:
SupplierFactoryFeatureObject
public class FeatureObject extends Object implements Marked, Loadable
Object which loads its configuration to features identified by keys.
Author:
Pavel
